LanguageData.CSP.resetall.label: Manual config reset
LanguageData.CSP.resetall.confirm: This will reset ALL values to vanilla values for all stuff
LanguageData.CSP.resetone.confirm: This will reset the values for {0} to vanilla values
LanguageData.CSP.logging.label: Enable verbose logging
LanguageData.CSP.logging.tooltip: Shows verbose logging, for finding errors
LanguageData.CSP.version.label: Installed mod-version: {0}
LanguageData.CSP.commonality.tooltip: How often this stuff is chosen when generating items
LanguageData.CSP.cleanlinessoffset.tooltip: Added cleanliness-value when used as building material
LanguageData.CSP.beautyoffset.tooltip: Added beauty-value when used as building material
LanguageData.CSP.beautymultiplier.tooltip: Beauty multiplier when used as material in recipes
LanguageData.CSP.worktobuildmultiplier.tooltip: Multiplier for the amount of work when used as material in buildings
LanguageData.CSP.worktomakemultiplier.tooltip: Multiplier for the amount of work when used as material in recipes
LanguageData.CSP.sharpdamagemultiplier.tooltip: Sharp damage multiplier when used as material in recipes
LanguageData.CSP.bluntdamagemultiplier.tooltip: Blunt damage multiplier when used as material in recipes
LanguageData.CSP.stuffpowerarmorsharp.tooltip: Sharp armor power when used as material in recipes
LanguageData.CSP.stuffpowerarmorblunt.tooltip: Blunt armor power when used as material in recipes
LanguageData.CSP.stuffpowerarmorheat.tooltip: Heat armor power when used as material in recipes
LanguageData.CSP.stuffpowerinsulationheat.tooltip: Heat insulation power when used as material in recipes
LanguageData.CSP.stuffpowerinsulationcold.tooltip: Cold insulation power when used as material in recipes
LanguageData.CSP.flammability.tooltip: Flammability when used as a building material
